title: Figure of Osiris
description:
Bronze figure of Osiris with separate inscribed base. Standing mummiform figure, hands grasping hook and flail. Crown of Upper Egypt flanked with feathers. Uraeus on crown.
Condition: Workmanship good. Cast solid.
section: The Third Intermediate Period and the Beginning of the Late Peri

museum_location.name: 19th Dynasty to Roman Period, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor
